column4: my network card works, it can find the network, i put in the correct wep key, but it won't connect, it just times out.... any ideas?
then do iwconfig, and check if your <device name>'s AP has a mac address
then do ifconfig and check if the <device name> has an IP
try again, i didn't get anything :p
PMs from unregistered users are blocked by freenode, you should register your nick with freenode
